creator: Rundfunk Berlin-Brandenburg
descriptionHtml:
Go on a discovery tour with the sandman through a colorful world full of surprises.
Ride with great cars and trains. Fly with the Sandman helicopter or the rocket. Play with cute animals. Dress up with funny hats and glasses and mix cool magic potions.

The creative game world
In the game world you are allowed to mix everything up, because with the "clean up button" (in the settings) you can clean up the world again and again.

Everything you play here you can record (video button in the upper right corner of the game world), save and send as a video.
With its numerous objects, this "digital doll's house" is perfect for creative role-playing games.

By the way, there is no mask obligation here, but if you want you can put one on the sandman and his friends.

The media library
In the media library with video and audio section you will find a lot of videos and audio stories of the Sandman and his friends.
You can watch the daily bedtime stories of the sandman for seven days.
Of course also with subtitles and signatures. You have to activate the sign in the "Settings".
You can also download all videos and audio stories to your device.

The Good Night Ritual
Always from 18.00 o'clock on you can watch the daily Sandman sequence in the app and let yourself be brought to sleep safe and sound ....
The good night button takes you directly from the front page to the current episode.

Mini games
Puzzle with beautiful sandman motives in different levels of difficulty
Memo game with the sandman and his friends Pittiplatsch, Schnatterinchen and Moppi

HIGHLIGHTS OF THE APP
- Meet the Sandman and his friends
- Discover a huge world with them
- Switch between day and night mode
- Travel in different vehicles
- Take care of animals and plants
- Bake a cake
- Mix cool potions
- Games on a playground
- Fell trees and use the wood to make a fire
- Disguise yourself
- Harvest vegetables and cook a delicious dish
- Change the wheels of all cars
- Media library with video and audio content
- Good night ritual: With one click to the current episode
- mini games: Puzzle
- Minigame: Memo - Discover couples

CHILDREN LEARN:
- Fantasy role playing games
- Telling your own stories
- Experiment
- Interaction with others
- Understanding the world
- cosmopolitanism

- Mix cool potions
- Games on a playground
- Fell trees and use the wood to make a fire
- Disguise yourself
- Harvest vegetables and cook a delicious dish
- Change the wheels of all cars
- Media library with video and audio content
- Good night ritual: With one click to the current episode
- mini games: Puzzle
- Minigame: Memo - Discover couples

descriptionShort: Build now your own Sandman episode

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New now. Build your own Sandman episode.

title: Our Sandman

creator: Rundfunk Berlin-Brandenburg
descriptionHtml:
Go on a discovery tour with the sandman through a colorful world full of surprises.
Ride with great cars and trains. Fly with the Sandman helicopter or the rocket. Play with cute animals. Dress up with funny hats and glasses and mix cool magic potions.

The creative game world
In the game world you are allowed to mix everything up, because with the "clean up button" (in the settings) you can clean up the world again and again.

Everything you play here you can record (video button in the upper right corner of the game world), save and send as a video.
With its numerous objects, this "digital doll's house" is perfect for creative role-playing games.

By the way, there is no mask obligation here, but if you want you can put one on the sandman and his friends.

The media library
In the media library with video and audio section you will find a lot of videos and audio stories of the Sandman and his friends.
You can watch the daily bedtime stories of the sandman for seven days.
Of course also with subtitles and signatures. You have to activate the sign in the "Settings".
You can also download all videos and audio stories to your device.

The Good Night Ritual
Always from 18.00 o'clock on you can watch the daily Sandman sequence in the app and let yourself be brought to sleep safe and sound ....
The good night button takes you directly from the front page to the current episode.

Mini games
Puzzle with beautiful sandman motives in different levels of difficulty
Memo game with the sandman and his friends Pittiplatsch, Schnatterinchen and Moppi

HIGHLIGHTS OF THE APP
- Meet the Sandman and his friends
- Discover a huge world with them
- Switch between day and night mode
- Travel in different vehicles
- Take care of animals and plants
- Bake a cake
- Mix cool potions
- Games on a playground
- Fell trees and use the wood to make a fire
- Disguise yourself
- Harvest vegetables and cook a delicious dish
- Change the wheels of all cars
- Media library with video and audio content
- Good night ritual: With one click to the current episode
- mini games: Puzzle
- Minigame: Memo - Discover couples

CHILDREN LEARN:
- Fantasy role playing games
- Telling your own stories
- Experiment
- Interaction with others
- Understanding the world
- cosmopolitanism

title:
Our Sandman
47.0.0

creator: Rundfunk Berlin-Brandenburg
descriptionHtml:
On November 22, 2024 we celebrate 65 years of Sandmännchen!
The Sandman app is therefore getting new content for the anniversary:
A coloring game with Sandman coloring pictures, cute birthday pictures and tricky puzzles.
Discover creative birthday moments together.

Go on a discovery tour with the sandman through a colorful world full of surprises.
Ride with great cars and trains. Fly with the Sandman helicopter or the rocket. Play with cute animals. Dress up with funny hats and glasses and mix cool magic potions.

The creative game world
In the game world you are allowed to mix everything up, because with the "clean up button" (in the settings) you can clean up the world again and again.

Everything you play here you can record (video button in the upper right corner of the game world), save and send as a video.
With its numerous objects, this "digital doll's house" is perfect for creative role-playing games.

By the way, there is no mask obligation here, but if you want you can put one on the sandman and his friends.

The media library
In the media library with video and audio section you will find a lot of videos and audio stories of the Sandman and his friends.
You can watch the daily bedtime stories of the sandman for seven days.
Of course also with subtitles and signatures. You have to activate the sign in the "Settings".
You can also download all videos and audio stories to your device.

The Good Night Ritual
Always from 18.00 o'clock on you can watch the daily Sandman sequence in the app and let yourself be brought to sleep safe and sound ....
The good night button takes you directly from the front page to the current episode.

Mini games
Puzzle with beautiful sandman motives in different levels of difficulty
Memo game with the sandman and his friends Pittiplatsch, Schnatterinchen and Moppi

HIGHLIGHTS OF THE APP
- Meet the Sandman and his friends
- Discover a huge world with them
- Switch between day and night mode
- Travel in different vehicles

- Mix cool potions
- Games on a playground

title:
Our Sandman
53.0.0

creator: Rundfunk Berlin-Brandenburg
descriptionHtml:
There is now an Easter egg hunt game in the Sandman app. Search through the game world and find the 6 hidden Easter eggs.

On November 22, 2024 we celebrate 65 years of Sandmännchen!
The Sandman app is therefore getting new content for the anniversary:
A coloring game with Sandman coloring pictures, cute birthday pictures and tricky puzzles.
Discover creative birthday moments together.

Go on a discovery tour with the sandman through a colorful world full of surprises.
Ride with great cars and trains. Fly with the Sandman helicopter or the rocket. Play with cute animals. Dress up with funny hats and glasses and mix cool magic potions.

The creative game world
In the game world you are allowed to mix everything up, because with the "clean up button" (in the settings) you can clean up the world again and again.

Everything you play here you can record (video button in the upper right corner of the game world), save and send as a video.
With its numerous objects, this "digital doll's house" is perfect for creative role-playing games.

By the way, there is no mask obligation here, but if you want you can put one on the sandman and his friends.

The media library
In the media library with video and audio section you will find a lot of videos and audio stories of the Sandman and his friends.
You can watch the daily bedtime stories of the sandman for seven days.
Of course also with subtitles and signatures. You have to activate the sign in the "Settings".
You can also download all videos and audio stories to your device.

The Good Night Ritual
Always from 18.00 o'clock on you can watch the daily Sandman sequence in the app and let yourself be brought to sleep safe and sound ....
The good night button takes you directly from the front page to the current episode.

Mini games
Puzzle with beautiful sandman motives in different levels of difficulty
Memo game with the sandman and his friends Pittiplatsch, Schnatterinchen and Moppi

HIGHLIGHTS OF THE APP
- Meet the Sandman and his friends
- Discover a huge world with them
- Switch between day and night mode
- Travel in different vehicles
- Take care of animals and plants
- Bake a cake
- Mix cool potions
- Games on a playground
- Fell trees and use the wood to make a fire
- Disguise yourself
- Harvest vegetables and cook a delicious dish
- Change the wheels of all cars
- Media library with video and audio content
- Good night ritual: With one click to the current episode
- mini games: Puzzle
- Minigame: Memo - Discover couples

CHILDREN LEARN:
- Fantasy role playing games
- Telling your own stories
- Experiment
- Interaction with others
- Understanding the world
- cosmopolitanism
